shots.narrative_caption: Bommi encourages people to take good care of their bones.
shots.descriptive_caption: Bommi stands outside by a well, talking and using hand gestures to encourage viewers to take care of their bones.  She is wearing a red top, yellow skirt, gold earrings and bracelet.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl places a leaf on a page in the book, and the green creature is perplexed.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blue cartoon hand places a green leaf onto a page in an open book, beside a drawing of a reddish leaf. A blue cartoon owl is holding a jar with fireflies, and the green creature stands next to him looking surprised.

shots.narrative_caption: The title card for Mickey Mouse is presented, stating "Mickey Mouse in Tapped Out".
shots.descriptive_caption: A stylized title card with a gold background and radial pattern of red, blue and white stripes and gold stars. The words 'Disney', 'Mickey Mouse', and 'Tapped Out' are displayed in a stylized font.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl looks at her toy.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium close up of a girl with a red bow looking down at a toy she's holding.

shots.narrative_caption: The children observe the turtle.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy with the baby turtle in his hand is approached by a group of three children. Two of the children look down with their eyes closed as if they are feeling sad.

shots.narrative_caption: A baby turtle turns around to show its shell, then turns to swim away.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shows a baby turtle swimming, turning around to show the brown and tan pattern of its shell, and then swimming off.

shots.narrative_caption: The gray tanks are scanned.
shots.descriptive_caption: The camera scans over the large group of gray tanks in a field. The scene is overlain with lines and text, including 'Ratte' and 'Aggressive reaction'.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature picks up the book and the owl holds the firefly jar. Close up of the glowing fireflies inside the jar.
shots.descriptive_caption: A bright green creature holds a blue book, and the blue cartoon owl holds a clear jar filled with glowing fireflies. There is a close-up of the jar, where two of the fireflies can be seen with smiling faces. A leafy background is also visible.

shots.narrative_caption: A close-up shot of the green tank's cannon and 'face'
shots.descriptive_caption: Close-up shot of the green cartoon tank. It has a cannon with two red stars and an aggressive-looking jagged face with a red clock-like eye.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy lies down and watches the baby turtle closely.
shots.descriptive_caption: The scene shows a close-up of the boy's face as he looks at the baby turtle lying on the beach. The boy is lying down, looking directly at the baby turtle with a soft smile. In the background, there are blue sky and some palm trees.

shots.narrative_caption: Bommi talks about bones in human body.
shots.descriptive_caption: Bommi with black hair in pigtails, is wearing a red shirt and yellow skirt. She stands near a well, speaking with hand gestures about the human body.

shots.narrative_caption: One pig wears sunglasses and another pig is nearby.
shots.descriptive_caption: Two pigs stand in the grass. One pig is wearing sunglasses.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy falls backward on the pile of nuts and the two girls join.
shots.descriptive_caption: A boy with black hair and an orange shirt falls backward onto a pile of brown nuts. Two girls with red curly hair and a teal top and a girl with black hair and a green top stand over the boy looking down at him.

shots.narrative_caption: An image appears with a logo.
shots.descriptive_caption: A brown background with a drawing of a figure with horns and an eye is shown with a green and yellow line in front of it.

shots.narrative_caption: The red fire engine and the yellow cement truck are seen next to each other, and there is a hose being moved between the two.
shots.descriptive_caption: The red fire engine is on the left and has a hose connected to the yellow cement truck that is on the right. Both are on train tracks in front of a red barn and green hills in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature is surprised to find itself in the middle of the ocean.
shots.descriptive_caption: A green creature in a bed on wheels is in the middle of the ocean. The background is light blue with white clouds. The green creature looks very surprised.

shots.narrative_caption: The grey tanks are being attacked.
shots.descriptive_caption: Several grey tanks sit on a green field with some trees. They are marked with a red paint and white ovals, while one grey tank is burning.

shots.narrative_caption: Some children run up onto the stage.
shots.descriptive_caption: Four children run up onto a wooden stage with a blue, star-studded curtain behind it. There are trees on both sides of the stage.

shots.narrative_caption: The two boys are talking.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium shot of two boys in a sandbox. The boy on the left has black hair and an orange shirt. The boy on the right has blond hair and a white shirt. There are sunflowers and a white fence in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The two friends talk while standing on the beach.
shots.descriptive_caption: A girl with dark skin and black puffy hair, wearing a green top and purple skirt, stands next to a boy with light skin and black hair, wearing an orange shirt. They are on a sandy beach, with trees and a blue sky in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: A protein figure enters the Ribosome.
shots.descriptive_caption: One yellow, bell-shaped protein figure with a pointed top, small arms and legs enters a orange factory like building labeled 'Ribosome Nr. 2,050,354'. The background is pink.

shots.narrative_caption: The yellow cement truck continues to drive on the tracks.
shots.descriptive_caption: The yellow cement truck drives on the train tracks. There is a red barn and green hills in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: A close up view of the castle's side.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close up of the right-hand side of the pink castle, showing four small rectangular windows above each other.

shots.narrative_caption: The scene moves to the animals in the yellow cement truck's water tank.
shots.descriptive_caption: The scene pans to the right to show the animals in the tank on the back of the yellow cement truck. There are two ducks and a pig in the tank.

shots.narrative_caption: The vesicle breaks as the antibody tank exits and moves.
shots.descriptive_caption: A gray tank-like figure with spikes on top, small treads, and carrying an axe exits from the broken vesicle and moves fast through the cell, which has a light brown swirling background.

shots.narrative_caption: The elderly man and green blob stand on the bridge.
shots.descriptive_caption: An elderly man with a white beard and a small green blob character are standing on top of the raised part of a bridge.

shots.narrative_caption: The three girls are in a room, holding their hands up with their fists clenched.
shots.descriptive_caption: Three animated girls with fair skin stand in a room with gray walls. The girl on the left has medium-length brown hair and wears a gray shirt. The girl in the middle has wavy blonde hair and wears a pink short-sleeve shirt. The girl on the right has straight black hair and wears a green short-sleeve shirt. They are all standing with their hands in the air with clenched fists.

shots.narrative_caption: The friends are still distressed and stare at the laptop.
shots.descriptive_caption: The three friends are looking away from the camera at the laptop screen. The girl with bob hair is on the right and is wearing a gray shirt and tan pants. The girl in the middle is blonde and wearing a pink shirt and dark jeans. The girl on the left has black hair and is wearing a green shirt and black pants.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature gives the owl a leaf, and fireflies fly out of the jar.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blue cartoon owl is sitting on the grass holding a clear glass jar, and three glowing fireflies fly out of it.  A green creature is holding a leaf in one hand and a book in the other. They are in front of a green forest with a night sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl and green creature look at the fireflies.
shots.descriptive_caption: In the forest, the owl is on the left and the green creature is on the right, both look to the left towards the leaf-shaped fireflies.

shots.narrative_caption: The camera shows the bricks of the castle
shots.descriptive_caption: The screen focuses on a close up of the pink bricks of the castle with dripping mortar.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl is looking at his backpack.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blue owl and the green alien are in the forest with the owl in front of his pink backpack.

shots.narrative_caption: The alien looks around.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up of the green alien, looking from side to side, holding a book.

shots.narrative_caption: The tanks encounter some round, spiky enemies in the field, and one says 'and we're going to Moscow'
shots.descriptive_caption: A very large tank is in the back along with regular tanks. There are many round spiky enemies, and one tank says 'and we're going to Moscow'.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature finds a leaf, and shows it to the owl, who has a jar and a book on the ground.
shots.descriptive_caption: The green creature, holding a leaf, stands on the left side of a stone bridge in the park, while the owl stands on the right with the jar. The green creature is showing a leaf.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy with blonde hair shows a baby turtle to his friends.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy with blonde hair shows the baby sea turtle in his hand to a group of three kids - two girls with black and red hair respectively and one boy.

shots.narrative_caption: The camera focuses on the green tank's cannon.
shots.descriptive_caption: The camera zooms in again on the green tank's jagged face and cannon, which has two red stars. The scene is set against a green field with a few trees and a blue sky with white clouds.

main_characters: Girl with brown hair and a red bow
shots.narrative_caption: A girl with brown hair appears on a wooden stage with blue star curtains and then a boy with blonde hair joins her.
shots.descriptive_caption: The scene shows a wooden stage with a blue curtain that has white stars on it. A girl with brown hair tied up with a red bow and wearing a pink dress with white hearts appears on stage. She moves her arms while standing near a red wagon. Then, a blonde haired boy dressed in a white shirt with a yellow and blue star design and orange pants appears on stage.

shots.narrative_caption: The red robot puts a box on top of the materials and they become stable.
shots.descriptive_caption: The red robot puts a wooden box on top of the building materials, making them stable. The sky is blue with white clouds in the background. The setting is the construction site.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy with yellow hair runs ahead of his friends.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy with yellow hair runs to the right, away from the camera and the three other children. The boy has a white shirt and orange pants, and his three friends are in the background. Behind them is a blue ocean with white waves and islands covered with trees.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature is smiling as it lies down in the bed.
shots.descriptive_caption: Close-up of a cartoon green creature, smiling, lying down in a wooden bed on wheels with a light blue blanket and a tan pillow in a cartoon forest scene.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl drives the car through the city streets.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blonde girl in the blue hooded outfit is driving the cartoon red car down a city street.

shots.narrative_caption: B cells moving around a nucleus inside a wall.
shots.descriptive_caption: A drawing of a pink wall with dark green lines, and a grey pyramid-shaped nucleus. A number of yellow, cartoon B cells with pointy heads are moving around. Some are on top of the wall, while some are in front of the nucleus, with arrows pointing upwards from the wall.

shots.narrative_caption: A young boy with blonde hair smiles into the camera.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shot of a young boy with short blonde hair and fair skin, wearing a white t-shirt with an orange collar. He is smiling and looking directly at the camera.

shots.narrative_caption: The car is not visible.
shots.descriptive_caption: An empty city street with buildings.

shots.narrative_caption: The green blob jumps into the air.
shots.descriptive_caption: A small green blob character jumps off of the raised part of a bridge.

shots.narrative_caption: A boy sees the hatched turtle in a small hole.
shots.descriptive_caption: A small boy with blond hair, a white t-shirt with a yellow star, orange shorts, and blue shoes stands on a sandy beach and looks down at a small hole in the sand.  A baby turtle can be seen in the hole along with pieces of its egg.

shots.narrative_caption: A close-up of the alien.
shots.descriptive_caption: Close-up of the green alien, looking to the left, holding a book.

shots.narrative_caption: The red fire engine and the yellow cement truck are looking at each other.
shots.descriptive_caption: The red fire engine and the yellow cement truck look at each other on train tracks with green hills in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The green car is flying up the bridge.
shots.descriptive_caption: A green cartoon car with a smiling face being driven by an elderly man with a white beard, is shown flying upwards on the raised part of a bridge.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl gives the alien a leaf.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blue owl is holding a leaf up to the green alien.  The green alien looks sad. The jar with fireflies glows next to the owl.

shots.narrative_caption: The camera pans from the front of the red train to a side view of the red train and its fan attachment.
shots.descriptive_caption: The camera shows a side view of the red train which has a large blue and gold fan attached. It is sitting on a train track in a grassy field. In the background there are green hills and a blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The alien is looking around.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blue owl and the green alien are in the forest with the owl in front of his pink backpack. The green alien is looking around with a book.

shots.narrative_caption: A B cell is shown with DNA letters inside it.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close up of a yellow B cell with brown face band on a gray background with swirl texture. The letters A, T, C, and G in a golden color are inside its shape. The B cell has a scared face.

shots.narrative_caption: A baby turtle emerges from the egg.
shots.descriptive_caption: A baby turtle crawls out of a broken egg, which appears to be a turtle egg. The background is yellow.

shots.narrative_caption: A pink castle is shown again.
shots.descriptive_caption: A pink, stylized drawing of a castle with crenellations on top and small details, against a beige, textured background.

shots.narrative_caption: The red train’s eyes close.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close up shot of the face of the red train whose eyes close. The background is light blue.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl with glasses leads the way while the boy with blond hair follows behind.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up view of two cartoon children in a forest setting. The girl with red hair leads and is looking at a piece of paper. A boy with blond hair is walking behind her.

shots.narrative_caption: A laptop plays the video of the three friends in the first scene.
shots.descriptive_caption: A laptop on a desk is turned on and playing the video of the three animated girls with fair skin stand in a room with gray walls. The girl on the left has medium-length brown hair and wears a gray shirt. The girl in the middle has wavy blonde hair and wears a pink short-sleeve shirt. The girl on the right has straight black hair and wears a green short-sleeve shirt. They are all holding their hands in the air with clenched fists.

shots.narrative_caption: A close up of Pete showing he’s about to strike
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shot of Pete showing his fierce look. Pete is a large black cat with blonde hair and a gray snout. He wears a green wrestling suit.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy is looking forward and smiling.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium shot of a boy with black hair, wearing an orange shirt with a green square, looking forward and smiling with a garden in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy is looking at the girl with the paper.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up of a cartoon boy with blonde hair, wearing a white t-shirt with a yellow star and a small frown. A cartoon girl with red hair in pigtails is to the right of the boy and looking down at her paper.

shots.narrative_caption: A yellow concrete mixer train moves along the tracks.
shots.descriptive_caption: A yellow train with a concrete mixer on the back is moving along a train track. The background is a blue sky and green hills.

shots.narrative_caption: The green tank is shown.
shots.descriptive_caption: A large, green tank with a red eye and sharp, jagged lines stands on a green field with a bright blue sky above.

shots.narrative_caption: The green alien yawns.
shots.descriptive_caption: A small, round, green alien with two antennae on its head and a wide smile is yawning in a yellow background.

shots.narrative_caption: The red train looks at two kids standing by the train tracks.
shots.descriptive_caption: A side view of the front of the red train. The two kids from the previous scene are standing next to the train tracks. In the background is a red building and green fields.

shots.narrative_caption: The scene shows a wide view of the forest at night.
shots.descriptive_caption: The cartoon forest background is shown at night, with a blue sky, a crescent moon, and a few stars.

shots.narrative_caption: A white screen is shown to introduce the next episode.
shots.descriptive_caption: A completely white screen is shown, and on the lower side of the screen there is a text, “Предыдущая серия”. There is a monster logo at the upper right corner.

shots.narrative_caption: The tanks and the round spiky enemies are silhouetted against the sunset.
shots.descriptive_caption: The tanks and their enemies are silhouetted against a red sunset background.

shots.narrative_caption: A baby turtle emerges from its egg.
shots.descriptive_caption: A baby turtle with an orange head and brown markings, crawls out of its white eggshell fragments on a light yellow background.

shots.narrative_caption: The scene shows the girl at an easel and the boy continues to play in the sandbox.
shots.descriptive_caption: The black-haired girl is seen more closely, drawing with a blue marker on a white canvas. In the background, the blond-haired boy is still playing in the sandbox.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature opens the book and places the leaf on a page.
shots.descriptive_caption: A lime-green cartoon hand places a reddish leaf onto a page in a book, beside a drawing of a similar leaf. It then flips through the book.

shots.narrative_caption: The red train expresses concern.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close up shot of the face of the red train. The train has wide eyes and appears to be concerned or scared.

shots.narrative_caption: The group looks at the boy with black hair who is in the middle of the sand box.
shots.descriptive_caption: A wide shot of four children around the sand box. The children are looking at the boy with black hair who is in the middle of the sand box. There is a toy boat near him and a toy bucket behind him. There are some easels near the fence in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: Close up of the green creature sleeping, then waking up.
shots.descriptive_caption: Close up of a cartoon green creature sleeping, then waking up in the bed.

shots.narrative_caption: An antibody tank comes out of an arch.
shots.descriptive_caption: A gray tank-like figure with spikes on top, small treads, and carrying an axe emerges from an orange arch with the label 'Antibodies', against a pink background.

shots.narrative_caption: The scene focuses on a green leaf placed on the book.
shots.descriptive_caption: The green creature is holding a green leaf onto the cover of the book.

shots.narrative_caption: The blond-haired boy shows the compass to the black-haired boy.
shots.descriptive_caption: The scene now shows the two boys in the sandbox. The blond-haired boy shows the compass to the black-haired boy.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl demonstrates and says "whole self", and dances.
shots.descriptive_caption: On a bright yellow background with two blue shadowy figures behind the girl on the left, a young girl with blonde hair and blue eyes, wearing a red top and patterned blue and white skirt, moves her whole body and dances. The text "Whole self" appears at the top, along with two images of a person's hands, a portrait of a women and two green sneakers.

shots.narrative_caption: One of the friends helps the turtle head to the water.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blond haired boy with fair skin is seen on his hands and knees, looking at a baby turtle that is near the water's edge. The setting is a sandy beach, with green trees and blue sky in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The police officer is standing in front of the police station.
shots.descriptive_caption: A police officer with a mustache, wearing a blue police uniform and a blue police cap, is standing near the door of the police station.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl and the green creature are standing in the forest with a jar and a book, respectively.
shots.descriptive_caption: In a green forest, a blue owl with big black eyes stands on the left and a green round creature stands on the right, holding a book. A jar sits between them.

shots.narrative_caption: Rows of purple shells are shown.
shots.descriptive_caption: Rows of dark purple shells are shown piled up inside a cave.

shots.narrative_caption: The young woman stands and then appears confused.
shots.descriptive_caption: The young woman with light brown hair wearing a pink dress with bows and a red sash stands on a plain light purple background. She smiles and then looks confused.

shots.narrative_caption: A police officer stops the girl in her car.
shots.descriptive_caption: On a cartoon city street, a police officer points towards a blonde girl in the blue hooded outfit driving a cartoon red car.

shots.narrative_caption: The red bird flies near a block building.
shots.descriptive_caption: The red bird flies by a structure made of yellow and green blocks. It is nighttime and the sky is blue. A moon and a few stars are also visible. A green tree is in the bottom left.

shots.narrative_caption: The four kids stand on stage in front of a painted beach scene.
shots.descriptive_caption: The four kids stand in front of a painted beach scene, the boy with blonde hair, the girl with red hair, the boy with black hair, and the girl with black hair. The boy with black hair has the wagon with the purple chest to the right of the stage.

shots.narrative_caption: Four figures are lined up in front of a sign; one figure exhales a green cloud.
shots.descriptive_caption: The scene displays a line of cartoon figures against a beige background. They are positioned in front of a banner that reads "Welcome to MOUNTAINSIDE GROCERY". One of the characters, with a pointed nose, has a green cloud emanating from his mouth.

shots.narrative_caption: A map is displayed.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shot shows a tank's arm holding two rolled-up documents, and then the map is displayed. The map is a parchment and shows a land with city names, ‘Moscow’ and ‘Leningrad’.

shots.narrative_caption: A close-up of a leaf.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up image of a green and orange leaf with a brown star-shaped spot in the middle.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl closes its eyes and then looks around.
shots.descriptive_caption: Close up on the blue owl, first with its eyes closed, then opening them wide. The green creature is partially visible on the right.

shots.narrative_caption: Two girls are standing next to each other in the backyard.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium shot of two girls standing near the sandbox. The girl on the left is wearing a yellow shirt and a purple skirt. The girl on the right has red hair, glasses, and is wearing a blue shirt and pink shoes. There are art easels in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: After Pete's slam, the audience sees the skeleton versions of Mickey and Goofy.
shots.descriptive_caption: A wide shot of the wrestling arena shows a burst of white smoke over the wrestling ring. The audience turns to see the skeleton versions of Mickey and Goofy.

shots.narrative_caption: One of the friends finds a turtle and holds it in his hands.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blond haired boy with fair skin and a white shirt holds a small turtle in his hands while looking at it with a surprised expression. They are on a sandy beach with a blue sky in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The screen shows a sequence of DNA code with the pathogen sequence highlighted.
shots.descriptive_caption: A monitor displays DNA sequence, with the letters A, T, C, G in gold color on a grey background. Certain sequences are highlighted in red, some with a line through them. The word 'DNA' is at the bottom of the screen.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature holds up a new leaf to the owl.
shots.descriptive_caption: The green creature is holding up a green leaf to the owl in the park.

shots.narrative_caption: A red and white train drives along the tracks near a red barn.
shots.descriptive_caption: A red and white fire truck train drives on a train track. A large red barn is in the background and is mostly in focus.

shots.narrative_caption: An egg-headed tank is driving in a field.
shots.descriptive_caption: A green tank with an egg-shaped head is driving on the grassy field. The background shows the blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl has a jar full of fireflies, and the green creature places the leaf on a page in the book.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blue cartoon owl with big white eyes and yellow feet is holding a clear glass jar with glowing fireflies in it. A green creature is holding an open book with a leaf on it. A small red bag with leaves inside sits on the grass.

shots.narrative_caption: The scene shows an open area of the forest.
shots.descriptive_caption: The cartoon forest background has green trees, bushes, and a path, under a light sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy looks down at something with a worried expression.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shot of a cartoon boy with blonde hair, wearing a white and orange shirt. He has a worried expression on his face and is looking downward.

shots.narrative_caption: A large group of gray tanks line up on the field.
shots.descriptive_caption: A large group of gray cartoon tanks is lined up on a green field. The tanks all have an aggressive face with a red dot and cross symbols. A green tree is visible in the left foreground.

shots.narrative_caption: The audience is cheering in the background.
shots.descriptive_caption: The audience cheers in the background, and in the foreground Donald is seen picking up his chips, with a frown on his face. He wears a blue suit.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy with black hair pulls a red wagon with a purple chest to the stage.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy with short black hair and an orange t-shirt and blue pants walks to the stage pulling a red wagon with a purple chest. In the background is a painted scene of a castle, a pink stool, a red ball, trees and houses.

shots.narrative_caption: A close up of the boy with blond hair looking happy.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium close up of the boy with blond hair, wearing a white shirt with orange accents and orange pants, looking happy. There are flowers and a white fence in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: Mickey has a watery eye and is running with his hands in the air.
shots.descriptive_caption: Mickey with one watery eye, is running quickly with his hands in the air, with blurred red color background.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl looks down at her toy.
shots.descriptive_caption: A medium close up of a girl with a red bow looking down at a toy she's holding.

shots.narrative_caption: The characters appear sad.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blue owl has his eyes closed and is leaning on the pink backpack.  The green alien is holding his book looking sad.

shots.narrative_caption: Three children talk among each other.
shots.descriptive_caption: On a green hill with green vegetation, a light blue sea, and a light blue sky with white clouds, three cartoon children are looking around and talking with each other.

shots.narrative_caption: The red birds gather around a blue owl, and the title of the video appears.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blue owl and a white bird sit on a green hill. Several red birds approach them. A white moon and many glowing green fireflies are visible in the background. Text appears at the end of the scene.

shots.narrative_caption: A baby sea turtle is held in someone's hand.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up of a small baby sea turtle being held in a person's hand, with a blue sky and some blurred trees in the background.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy walks into frame.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy wearing the brown cowboy hat is shown holding a snow blower. He walks into the view and is shown looking up and to the side.

shots.narrative_caption: Several tanks are lined up in a row on the green field.
shots.descriptive_caption: Several tanks are standing in line on the green field. The tanks have cartoon faces on them. Some of them have red triangles on top of them. The tank in front has a white face and is filled with white rice and a brown rock. The background is a green field and a blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The green tank launches missiles toward the battlefield.
shots.descriptive_caption: Many missiles with a silver body, red tip and a long yellow flame appear in the bright blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: A yellow tank with gears on it moves to the right.
shots.descriptive_caption: A bright yellow tank with gears on its body moves to the right. The tank has an orange smile on its face and a small periscope. The background is a green field and a blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: A tank is shown at a door with some text above the door.
shots.descriptive_caption: A green tank is shown at a dark door with the text 'ПРОЕКТ КВ-54' in Cyrillic above the door.

shots.narrative_caption: The grey and green tanks have reached their destination and one of the tanks dreams.
shots.descriptive_caption: A variety of tanks, including a grey tank with a white mouth and red marking, and a large grey tank with a red eye, stand in the night with scattered stars.  Text bubbles show above the tanks.

shots.narrative_caption: An egg-headed tank is inside a dark space then it looks through the window at the outside.
shots.descriptive_caption: The view inside a vehicle is shown, and through a window the viewer can see the blue sky. There are two white eggs-shaped objects in the window. And the camera goes up so that the entire window is displayed. In the next shot a green vehicle with an egg-shaped head appears.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy watches the turtle in the hole.
shots.descriptive_caption: A small boy with blond hair, a white t-shirt with a yellow star, orange shorts, and blue shoes stands on a sandy beach and looks down at a small hole in the sand where the baby turtle is.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl and the green creature move along the park.
shots.descriptive_caption: The owl and the green creature are walking along the stone path in the park. Fireflies and fallen leaves are on the ground.

shots.narrative_caption: Tanks are being placed on a train to march forward.
shots.descriptive_caption: Tanks are loaded on a train to march on the green fields with blue skies.

shots.narrative_caption: The green boat is in the water and the man is still on the bridge.
shots.descriptive_caption: A green cartoon boat with a smiling face is in the water near the bottom of a raised bridge where an elderly man with a white beard is standing on the top.

shots.narrative_caption: A gray tank is shown climbing up a slope.
shots.descriptive_caption: A gray tank with teeth and a dark eye is shown climbing a slope. The background is a green field with blue sky.

shots.narrative_caption: The alien transformed into a helicopter.
shots.descriptive_caption: The small, round, green alien with two antennae has transformed into a green helicopter with white stars around its body, while the police officer is running behind the helicopter.

shots.narrative_caption: The crane is about to hook some building material.
shots.descriptive_caption: The green crane with eyes prepares to lift a stack of building materials tied with grey ropes.  The setting is a construction site with sand.

shots.narrative_caption: An announcer is shown and then Pete flexes his muscles.
shots.descriptive_caption: A pig announcer with a mustache and a bow tie is standing and using a phone. Then a view of Pete shows him flexing his muscles.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy watches a baby turtle hatch from its egg.
shots.descriptive_caption: A cartoon boy with blonde hair, orange pants and blue boots lies on his stomach looking into a small sand pit, where a small turtle has hatched.

shots.narrative_caption: A massive fire consumes the scene.
shots.descriptive_caption: A massive fire blast engulfs the scene on the right side.

shots.narrative_caption: The green creature shows the owl a leaf.
shots.descriptive_caption: A bright green, big-eyed cartoon creature with yellow hands and feet is holding a red leaf. A blue owl is sitting nearby with a jar. A gray book is in front of them on the sandy path through a forest with green bushes and red berries.

shots.narrative_caption: The boy and girl are close to the blue curtain and are holding a rope.
shots.descriptive_caption: The boy with blonde hair and the girl with red hair are close to the blue curtain holding a rope, they are smiling and talking. The girl is waving.

shots.narrative_caption: The girl demonstrates and says "left hand", and moves her left hand.
shots.descriptive_caption: On a bright yellow background with two blue shadowy figures behind the girl on the left, a young girl with blonde hair and blue eyes, wearing a red top and patterned blue and white skirt, waves her left hand. The text "Left hand" appears at the top, along with two images of a left hand.

shots.narrative_caption: An image of the skeletal system highlights the thigh bone.
shots.descriptive_caption: A blue bordered image shows a skeleton with the thigh bone indicated, in front of a dark background.

shots.narrative_caption: A close-up shot of the turtle's head.
shots.descriptive_caption: A close-up shot of a baby turtle's head, with a yellow background.

shots.narrative_caption: The view shifts showing the boy alone on the beach, while his friends walk away.
shots.descriptive_caption: A wide view of a beach with two cartoon girls and a cartoon boy walking down the path by the ocean from a high angle. The boy is farther back on the path than the girls.

shots.narrative_caption: The owl carries the jar of fireflies away.
shots.descriptive_caption: The blue owl moves through the bushes to the right, carrying a glowing jar of fireflies.

shots.narrative_caption: Pete turns his head to look away.
shots.descriptive_caption: Pete, the large black cat with blonde hair, turns his head away from the ring. He wears a green wrestling suit.
